Texting_Sequence_1: ^hey Emerald this is Amika! guess what I found on my walk today . . .
^street art of Memi stenciled on an overpass!!!
^Amika!!! hey! nice to hear from you :) I could never forget our little guy! I wonder what he's doing out west though? lol
^I think I still have the notebook we drew him in! or maybe I left it at my parents during the move. I still haven't finished going through all the boxes tbh
^yeah I remember your car was packed to the brim! it's a miracle all your art supplies made it to California in one piece haha
^btw what's your apartment like? I never got the pics
^oh gosh I didn't mean to ghost!

c-0: ^I know you're having lots of new adventures!
c-1: ^aw well I appreciate you taking the time to talk now!
g-0: ^I live in a one bedroom close to a park so I see doggos almost every day
^it must be nice to have a place of your own! hopefully that's still possible for me
^oh are you trying to move off campus this semester?
^but anyway that can’t really be Memi right?
^it looks just like him but it's street art! who would have found our vocaloid mascot from high school? XD
^I mean I haven’t posted about him in a minute unless you have?
^oh yeah I saw that you’ve kept up your vocaloid blog! I actually let mine drop off oops 😫

c-2: ^I just don’t have time for that kind of stuff anymore
^totally, I'm super busy these days too! but always glad to keep you in the loop lol
^I appreciate it :) I'm pretty far out of the loop at this point though. like deep space
^I'll rope you back in! like how they space lassoed matt damon in that movie
^haha good to know you'll always catch me up. but wasn't I the one that got you into vocaloid in the first place??
^the mentor has become the student . . . how the turntables
c-3: ^I wish I could keep up with it more. I wouldn’t know any new songs unless you posted them haha
^yeah I bet you’re busy living it up in LA!
^hardly lol more like busy trying to stay afloat
^I've only been one time since moving here!
^that's more than me! I haven't been to the beach in like 10 years
^I promise I am a total west coast fraud lol. can't relax
c-4: ^oh yeah, I keep it updated! there's still a good community going
^last time I logged on even more people had deactivated
^we're a small but mighty group left!

g-1: ^I'm really sorry I haven’t messaged more often.
^how’s California so far? don't tell me you say "stoked" and "beggle" now :O

c-5: ^so great you’ll never come back haha
^sorry, I wanted to make it over the summer! but I didn’t have enough days off as a new hire
^I’m just giving you a hard time! maybe we can meet up over Thanksgiving?
^my folks are going to visit me out here actually . . . they want to escape the Illinois cold for a bit
^oh that sounds fun. but I’m coming after you for that raincheck!
c-6: ^everything's crazy. I haven’t been able to think straight or take a breath
^I’m alright, it’s just that work takes up so much mental space. I feel like I’m playing catch up with everyone else and just trying to make it till the next deadline
^I have no idea why they picked me. I might not be cut out for this
^I felt the same about school you know
^are you kidding? or did I dream up all those Chicago Youth Symphony recitals?
^oh my gosh! remember that blizzard on the way to sectionals??
c-7: ^oh my gosh no I have no chill lately
^um when did you have chill to begin with??

g-2: ^I knew there wouldn't be snow this time of year but I'm still getting used to it haha
^it feels so wrong for the month and the weather to not line up!
^but hey you get the Burbank sunshine to make up for it! now that the hour changed it’s dark here at like 5:00 pm
^yeah I guess that’s a plus. did you do anything fun during break?
^you guys had fall break already right?
^oh yeah I didn’t do anything though lol

c-8: ^LOL as if! sleep is for the weak
c-9: ^there are no breaks after graduation, you know
^thanks mom LOL I just didn't feel like doing anything special

g-3: ^what else are you doing this semester?
^I mean not much compared to you!!
^drawing all day and spotting celebrities, I’m jealous haha
^no no it’s not like that! I’m just a prop artist, I don’t get to meet the voice talent. and all the spottings are over in silver lake xD
^you're closer to your dream than a lot of people get! you’re totally on your way to being a great director
^directing might not be my dream anymore actually

c-11: ^it's harder to be disappointed if you reset your expectations
^hmm. does giving up actually save yourself the disappointment or just front load it?
^like are you actually changing your mind or are you letting your fear make the decision?

^if you don’t want to anymore that’s totally your choice! plans change. but I hope you’re not counting yourself out because you think you CAN’T do it. you’re an amazing artist, Amika! you have so much to be proud of already. if it means anything, I’M proud of you :)
^oh wow that means the world to me!! I appreciate you saying that Emerald, you always know how to cheer me up :)
c-12: ^I'm nothing like the directors at my studio
^I know I'm only starting out but I just feel invisible sometimes. I don't know why anyone would care what I have to say
^isn't it worth sharing your stories even if it feels like no one's listening?

^if you don’t want to anymore that’s totally your choice! plans change. but I hope you’re not counting yourself out because you think you CAN’T do it. you’re an amazing artist, Amika! you have so much to be proud of already. if it means anything, I’M proud of you :)
^oh wow that means the world to me!! I appreciate you saying that Emerald, you always know how to cheer me up :)

g-4: ^you have nothing to be sorry for!
^well if I ever do make a film you’re my first choice for music! I know you would write a killer score
^have you been working on any new songs for class?
^not really - I’ve actually been spending more time listening lately. I’m working on a post right now about nostraightanswer, have you heard of them?
^I've had this song “Wishing Well” on repeat. I find it soothing, it’s been keeping me going this year.
^if you listen to it you'll see! if you need a pressure valve from the rush of the city it might help
^anyway sorry to head out so soon but I have to finish up this post and catch some sleep before heading to work, I got stuck with the graveyard again rip
^your school library has a graveyard shift??
^oh I work off campus now! so yeah crazy hours
^bummer . . . maybe they’re hiring somewhere else on campus?
^I checked but all the on campus jobs are taken actually
^but I really do have to go now, you should look up the song!
